snippet: The Russian Foreign Ministry distanced itself from comments by Mikhail Bogdanov, suggesting his comments were given informally and not meant for publication.
lead_paragraph: The Russian Foreign Ministry distanced itself from comments by Mikhail Bogdanov, suggesting his comments were given informally and not meant for publication.

headline.seo: Russia Steps Back From Envoy’s Comments on Syria
